detail_desc: Sleeveless playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Sleeveless, ankle-length dress in a viscose weave with flounces. V-neck front and back, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless, ankle-length dress in a viscose weave with flounces. V-neck front and back, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Skirt in a patterned viscose weave with side pockets and frill-trimmed, gathered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
Skirt in a patterned viscose weave with side pockets and frill-trimmed, gathered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
Short, pattern-weave skirt with a high waist, decorative zip and button at the front, and deep side pockets. Unlined.
Sun hat in a patterned cotton weave with elastication and a sewn-on bow at the back and ties under the chin. Lined.
Sun hat in a patterned cotton weave with elastication and a sewn-on bow at the back and ties under the chin. Lined.
Sun hat in a patterned cotton weave with elastication and a sewn-on bow at the back and ties under the chin. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in a lightweight cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps, elastication and a wide flounce at the top with broderie anglaise, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in a lightweight cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps, elastication and a wide flounce at the top with broderie anglaise, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Decorative bow at the back and ties under the chin. Lined.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Decorative bow at the back and ties under the chin. Lined.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Decorative bow at the back and ties under the chin. Lined.
Short, off-the-shoulder jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Short, off-the-shoulder jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Shirt in washed denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, and flap chest pockets with a press-stud.
Sleeveless dress in airy, patterned chiffon with narrow shoulder straps and three tiers to create width. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in airy, patterned chiffon with narrow shoulder straps and three tiers to create width. Lined.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and elastication with a flounce at the top. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and elastication with a flounce at the top. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Flared skirt in a sturdy, fine-knit cotton blend with an embroidered pattern, and concealed elastication at the waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with an embroidered pattern, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequined motif on the front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short parka in cotton twill with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with metal press-studs down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and a short tab and press-stud at the cuffs. Jersey lining.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with print motif, jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless, padded dinosaur fancy dress costume with a hook and loop fastening at the back, long legs with elasticated hems and a detachable tail.
Sleeveless, padded dinosaur fancy dress costume with a hook and loop fastening at the back, long legs with elasticated hems and a detachable tail.
Short, fitted halterneck dress in ribbed jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. V-neck and decorative straps at the back. Lined.
Bow tie and matching handkerchief in a patterned cotton weave. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and a fastener at the back. Width 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.
Fancy dress costume in velour and jersey with embroidery and appliqués. Lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems.
Fancy dress costume in printed velour with appliqués. Lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, front pockets, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems.
Ankle-length suit trousers in an airy linen and cotton blend with a zip fly and hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and tapered legs with creases.

Shorts in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while running. Elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and ventilating mesh at the crotch for increased ventilation. Legs with reflective details for increased visibility outdoors and a slit in one side of the hems. Soft jersey inner shorts.

Tunic in an airy, patterned weave with a round neck and button placket. Long raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a gentle flare to the hem.

Knee-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Short, lightweight running shorts in woven fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped side pockets, ventilating mesh at the crotch and a reflective print on the back of the legs. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waistband with a concealed drawstring and key pocket. Inset mesh sections with contrasting colour details.

Lightweight cotton flannel shirt in a straight, gently tapered fit with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
KATE MORGAN x H&M. Skirt in mesh covered in shiny sequins that create a pattern. Glittery elastic waistband. Underskirt in woven fabric.

Fancy dress costume in woven fabric with a print motif and a matching helmet. Costume with a stand-up collar with a padded edge, zip down the front, plastic fastener at the front of the waist and elastication at the back. Ribbed cuffs and elasticated hems. Helmet with a hook and loop fastener at the front.
3/4-length outdoor trousers in stretch, partially water-repellent fabric. Elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, a leg pocket with a taped zip, front pockets and seams on the legs.
